name: In The Wake of Gods
description: Unofficial addon for Heroes of Might and Magic III
author: WoG Team & epigones

9.1.22: Reworked wog creature icons by Aphra
9.1.21: Updated some wog creature icons by Aphra
9.1.20: Update WoG Graphic Fix biomes for 2.19
9.1.19: Update WoG Graphic Fix to v2.18 part2
9.1.18: Update WoG Graphic Fix to v2.18
9.1.14: Add biomes config for Graphic Fix submod
9.1.13: New town theme by Fabrice-TIERCELIN and AI Udio
9.1.8: Changed mask of Emissary banks so they can spawn on random maps.
9.1.7: Fixed Mirror of Home-Way mask. Also, gold will not use Mithril skin anymore.
9.1.6: WoG Graphics Fix mod updated based on Grossmaster's 2.15 version
9.1.5: Alms House will now use new selectAll feature for rewards
9.1.4: WoG Graphics Fix mod updated based on Grossmaster's 2.141 version
9.1.2: WoG Graphics Fix mod updated based on Grossmaster's 2.14 version
9.0.7: Added Sphinx and Mushrooms object to the map
9.0.5: Fixed problem with some wog artifacts

chinese.name: 追随神迹（WoG）
chinese.description: 追随神迹（In The Wake of God）是《英雄无敌 III》的非官方资料片。该模组最大的特征是追随者（Henchmen）系统和生物经验系统，并增加了新的生物，技能，设施和机制。
